title._content: [Portrait of Tommy Myles and Tommy Potter, ca. Mar. 1942] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Tommy Myles and Tommy Potter, ca. Mar. 1942] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 427 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Myles, Tommy Potter, Tommy, 1918- Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Music stores--1940-1950. Music critics--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
